item.title: Everything Venom: The Last Dance Sets Up For Sony's Spider-Man Universe
item.description: Venom: The Last Dance might be the final chapter in Tom Hardy’s Venom trilogy, but it has set up several potential future narratives for the SSU.

item.title: “Never Quite Experienced Before”: The Monsters In Nicolas Cage’s Horror Movie Arcadian With 78% RT Score Leaves VFX Artists Mixed
item.description: VFX artists give mixed reviews on the visual effects used to render the creatures in Nicolas Cage's newest post-apocalyptic horror film, Arcadian.

item.title: 10 Bloodiest Scenes From All The Terrifier Movies
item.description: Art the Clown is responsible for some of the most gut-churning kills in all of horror cinema, some of which spill far more blood than others.
